name: Bio_Industries
title: Bio Industries
author: TheSAguy
description: Bio Industries provides some useful buildings and items to the game, like the  Bio Farm for growing trees. Solar Farm and Large Accumulator to make your electric setup easier. Adds a Bio Fuel section to produce organic plastic and batteries. Adds a lot of New Wood Products, like the big electric pole, wooden pipes, dart turret. Additional Features: Planting trees using seedlings. Change terrain from deserts to grasslands using Fertilizer, this also helps trees grow better. And a lot moreâ€¦  Please visit the homepage on the forums for more information and feedback.
